meanings.definition: Most distant in space or time
meanings.sent1: The farthest star in the sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent2: She traveled to the farthest corner of the world.
meanings.sent3: The cat's toy mouse ended up in the farthest corner of the room.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was the farthest thing from his mind.
meanings.sent5: The farthest memories of childhood bring a smile to my face.

meanings.definition: To the greatest extent or degree
meanings.sent1: She farthested her efforts to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent2: He always farthests his abilities when faced with a challenge.
meanings.sent3: The chef farthested the flavors in the new dish, creating a unique taste.
meanings.sent4: The team farthested their lead in the final minutes of the game.
meanings.sent5: The singer farthested her vocal range during the performance.
